ing: 3 teaspoons finely chopped jalapeno chile peppers
des: "This salsa is sweet, tart and fresh, like a perfect summer day. Raspberries are blended with the vibrant flavors of jalapeno and cilantro to create a crowd pleasing topper for pork and other savory foods."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together raspberries, sweet onion, jalapeno chile peppers, garlic, cilantro, white sugar and lime juice. Cover and chill in the refrigerator at least 1 hour before serving.
